name: Meisha Retsuden: Greatest 70's
overview: Meisha Retsuden: Greatest 70's is one of the rarest racing games, this is a simulator of Japan's classic sporty coupes and sports cars. The game features a very interesting selection of the 70's machines including the classy Isuzu Bellett to the grand Toyota 2000GT. Best played with analog, the physics are actually good with these low tech RWD cars that have no traction & stability control, driving them can't be more fun! The game modes are: - Story mode - Time attack mode - Data Book: Show cars specs and a movie of that car, only 2 are avaliable to watch at the beginning of the game, but more can be unlocked.
